mapper.update: UPDATE event_comment SET spoiler_report=spoiler_report+1 WHERE event_comment_key= #{eventCommentKey} AND customer_id = #{customerId}
UPDATE event_comment SET insult_report=insult_report+1 WHERE event_comment_key= #{eventCommentKey} AND customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM event_comment WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND event_comment_key = #{eventCommentKey}
mapper.select: SELECT ec.event_comment_key eventCommentKey , ec.event_comment_content eventCommentContent , ec.createdate createdate , ec.customer_id customerId , ec.schedule_key scheduleKey , ec.event_key eventKey , ec.insult_report insultReport , ec.spoiler_report spoilerReport , e.event_end_date eventEndDate , c.customer_email customerEmail FROM event_comment ec INNER JOIN event e ON ec.event_key = e.event_key INNER JOIN customer c on c.customer_id = ec.customer_id WHERE e.event_end_date < CURRENT_DATE() AND ec.event_key = #{eventKey}

SELECT ec.event_comment_key eventCommentKey , ec.event_comment_content eventCommentContent , ec.createdate createdate , ec.event_key eventKey , ec.insult_report insultReport , ec.spoiler_report spoilerReport , c.customer_id customerId , ci.file_name fileName FROM event_comment ec INNER JOIN customer c ON ec.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_img ci ON ci.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE ec.event_key = #{eventKey} ORDER BY ec.createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
